DOC.detailed_description: From day -01 onwards end study , subject come TNO every week . Each four study period perform identically . In first study period , day -01 , 07 , 14 , 21 28 , subject come TNO collection study substance come week . On day 14 , 21 28 come fasting state morning blood sampling ( fast ) . Fasting blood sample take venapuncture . After receive new study substance diary come week , subject leave TNO . On day 34 , subject come TNO around 8:00 stay TNO till 11:00 oral glucose tolerance test . Fasting blood sample collect determine treatment parameter . Subsequently subject provide oral glucose load 75 g glucose dissolve 300 ml water . Blood sample take t= 90 120 min glucose load . After last sample OGTT collect , subject ask void bladder afterwards receive bottle collection 24 hour urine . The subject receive free breakfast leave TNO . The next day , Day 35 , subject consume breakfast provide TNO home around 8:00.They come TNO around 11:00 stay TNO till 20:00 . In addition , turn urine bottle void bladder 24 start collection . A canula insert collection sample rest day . At four hour consumption subject provide high fat meal . Blood sample take = 30 , 60 , 120 , 180 , 240 360 min meal . Throughout challenge sample subject allow drink water . After last sample test take subject receive free dinner . After dinner adipose tissue biopsy take local anesthesia . The subject receive new study substance diary come week , start next day . In next three study period , procedure identical .
